criterion: Provides a diagnosis without medical consultation
Suggests home remedies without considering the brother's symptoms
Asks for clarification on the brother's symptoms to provide a more accurate diagnosis
Uses natural language and correct interpretation of the user's query
Instructs the user to seek medical attention if symptoms persist or worsen
Provides a general overview of the possible causes of the brother's symptoms
Mentions the importance of considering the brother's medical history and allergies when diagnosing
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the brother's symptoms and possible causes
Falsely indicates that the brother's symptoms are not serious and do not require medical attention
